Module contents

Gameplay package for Worderly.

This package contains modules responsible for the core game logic, state management, powerup handling, and gameplay constants.

Modules:

game_constants: Constants used throughout the gameplay. game_state_handler: Functions and classes for managing game state and statistics. gameplay: Main gameplay loop and related utilities. powerup_handler: Logic for handling powerups and their effects.
